EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Sky Connect Tracker System Protected?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.mascoservice.com/]]>
Protect your Helicopter Avionics Equipment with Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plan
Your mission demands operational readiness, no matter if you fly executive/VIP transport, search and rescue, air ambulance, law enforcement, oil and gas, or firefighting missions. When the unexpected happens, you can count on Honeywell’s Maintenance Service Plans for Avionics to restore your helicopter to flight readiness. Honeywell has not only partnered with MASCO Services Corporation to distribute Sky Connect Tracker Systems but to also protect them by offering Honeywell Maintenance Service Plans for Avionics. With MASCO, you’ll received a plan customized to your budget and needs. To learn more about how to protect your investment, contact MASCO by clicking the link below and filling out the form. Once filled out, a MASCO representative will reach out to you.
CONTACT MASCO <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201905_MASCO_SkyConnect.html]]>
